thread.title: J. Cole Bringing "4 Your Eyez Only" Documentary To HBO
thread.title_full: J. Cole Bringing "4 Your Eyez Only" Documentary To HBO

author: Ural Garrett
title: J. Cole Bringing "4 Your Eyez Only" Documentary To HBO
text:
J. Cole Bringing "4 Your Eyez Only" Documentary To HBO March 24, 2017 | 10:55 AM 1 
Dreamville, USA – J. Cole is teaming up with HBO and director Scott Lazer again for a documentary based on the release of last year’s 4 Your Eyez Only . Previously, the team linked up for last year’s 2014 Forest Hill Drive documentary. 
Incorporating music from Cole’s fourth full-length studio album, the one-hour documentary has him visiting areas like Baton Rouge and his hometown of Fayetteville, North Carolina. 
“The documentary promises to illustrate how their struggles over viable housing, voting laws for felons, integration, and more mirror the frustrations felt across the nation,” reported Entertainment Weekly. 
Before the release of 4 Your Eyez Only, Cole dropped a 40-minute film called Eyez, which was directed by Lazer as well. 
In June, Cole plans on supporting the project with a tour that kicks off in Columbia, SC. 
The new documentary is set to premiere Saturday, April 15 at 10 p.m. EST. Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You! Thank You! Thank You!
